address: Phường Hưng Chiến, Thị xã Bình Long, Tỉnh Bình Phước
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Phường Hưng Chiến"**

Okay, so I'm presented with the old address "Phường Hưng Chiến, Thị xã Bình Long, Tỉnh Bình Phước" and need to figure out its current administrative unit. My initial thought process is to break this down logically.

First, I identified "Tỉnh Bình Phước" as the starting point. Remembering my knowledge of provincial changes, I immediately checked resolutions like 60-NQ/TW to see if "Bình Phước" was affected by any mergers or renamings.  Sure enough, I found the resolution confirming that Bình Phước became "Tỉnh Đồng Nai."

Next, I zeroed in on "Phường Hưng Chiến." Time to delve into the relevant resolutions. A quick search through "Other resolutions" using keywords like "Phường Hưng Chiến," "Bình Phước," and "Đồng Nai" yielded the crucial resolution: "1662/NQ-UBTVQH15." This resolution was gold! It explicitly mentioned "Phường Hưng Chiến" and stated that it, along with other wards and communes, was being merged to form a new ward named "phường Bình Long." Crucially, the resolution was clearly for "Tỉnh Đồng Nai," confirming I was on the right track.

To solidify my findings, I double-checked the "New wards" section.  I was looking for a match with "phường Bình Long" within "Tỉnh Đồng Nai." And there it was, an exact match: `{"ward_code":"25326","ward_name":"Phường Bình Long","province_name":"Tỉnh Đồng Nai"}`. Perfect.

Now, it's a matter of constructing the output. Given the direct match and clear citation from Resolution 1662, my confidence is extremely high.  The new province name is definitely "Tỉnh Đồng Nai," the ward code is "25326," and the new ward name is "Phường Bình Long." I have a complete, confident answer.

citation.header: 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Đồng Nai
citation.line: 83. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các phường An Lộc, Hưng Chiến, Phú Đức, xã Thanh Bình (huyện Hớn Quản) thành phường mới có tên gọi là phường Bình Long.
